title: Meta’s Threads tops 100 million users in just 5 days, Zuckerberg says
description: In less than a week, the Twitter competitor has become one of the most downloaded social media apps in the United States.

title: Judge denies Justice Dept.'s request for a stay of social media injunction
description: The Trump-appointed judge rejected the DOJ's argument that the order could chill law enforcement activity and undermine national security interests.

title: Employees want ChatGPT at work. Bosses worry they’ll spill secrets.
description: Companies know the AI tool could be a game-changer, but fears about security and privacy are holding them back.

title: People are paying to break printers with sledgehammers in smash rooms
description: Americans hate printers so much we're paying money to destroy them in smash rooms. It's good for our emotions, but bad for human health and the environment.

title: We hate printers as much as you do. Printer Week is here to help.
description: Here’s some advice to make your printer a little less predatory.

title: Your printing service might read your documents. Here’s what to know.
description: Some printers and printing services are snooping on your documents. Here's a quick guide to printer privacy for people in a rush.
